mdRecord.dcterms:title: Lex mercatoria: or, A complete code of commercial law; being a general guide to all men in business .. With an account of our mercantile companies; of our colonies and factories abroad; of our commercial treaties with foreign powers; of the duty of consuls, and of the laws concerning aliens, naturalization, and denization. To which is added, an account of the commerce of the whole world; describing the manufactures and products of each country, with tables of correspondence and agreement of their respective coins, weights and measures. The whole equally calculated for the information and service of the merchant, lawyer, member of Parliament, and private gentleman / By the late Wyndham Beawes
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Beawes, Wyndham.
Chitty, Joseph, 1776-1841
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Commerce
Commercial law
Maritime law
